analysis.description:
AlgoryCrowdsale.AlgoryCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#662-684) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == token.totalSupply())

Reentrancy in AlgoryCrowdsale.allowRefunding (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#745-752):
	External calls:
	- state = getState() (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#748)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowRefund (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#751)

AlgoryCrowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#792-816) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && block.timestamp >= startsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#805-816)
	- block.timestamp >= presaleStartsAt && block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#801-816)
	- block.timestamp < presaleStartsAt (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#800-816)
	- ! allowRefund && block.timestamp > endsAt (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#810-816)

CrowdsaleToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#392-394)
PricingStrategy.presaleMaxValue should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0xee3e4e2467c0c5aa7b7d944881d51ccb36fefcca.sol#545)
